import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Form, FormGroup, Label, Input, Button } from 'reactstrap' const AddUser = () => { const [user, setUser] = useState({ username: '', email: '', }) const { username, email } = user const onInputChange = (e) => { setUser({ ...user, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }) } const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() console.log(username, email) } return ( <>
